snippet: In a separate report, the Labor Department announced a 0.5 percent decrease in its closely watched producer price index in September.
abstract: Commerce Dept reports retail sales rose 0.1 percent in September, compared with flat sales in August; Labor Dept says producer price index fell 0.5 percent in September.
lead_paragraph: In a separate report, the Labor Department announced a 0.5 percent decrease in its closely watched producer price index in September.

headline.main: U.S. Retail Sales Rose 0.1% Last Month, Commerce Dept. Says
headline.print_headline: Signals for Economy in Weak Retail Sales
